DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter trial evaluate efficacy safety treatment AMN107 chronic myelogenous leukemia ( CML ) patient resistant and/or intolerant imatinib mesylate therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Oral AMN107 Adults With Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia Resistant and/or Intolerant Imatinib Mesylate Therapy
DOC.criteria: Imatinib resistant intolerant Philadelphia chromosomepositive CML blast crisis , accelerate chronic phase Males females â‰¥ 18 year age Impaired cardiac function Acute chronic liver renal disease Use therapeutic coumadin Central nervous system ( CNS ) infiltration Additional protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
